name: @TinycellCorp/cheatjs
description: Game engine agnostic cheat UI (bottom sheet)

scripts.build: npm run inject-version && npm run minify && npm run validate-types && npm run type-check
scripts.version: npm run build && git add cheat.js cheat.min.js
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "release: v%s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "release: v%s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "release: v%s" && git push && git push --tags
